title: r/Choosingbeggars Seeking Nanny Who will Pay ME for the Honor of Working
description: r/Choosingbeggars Any girls out there looking for an apartment to rent? For the amazing price of $200, you can live in a run-down apartment where you will also have to work as the full-time caregiver for a senior citizen. Basically, you have to pay your employer for the honor of working! Yep -- this guy honestly expects a full-time, live-in nanny to PAY for the opportunity to work. Anybody interested?
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
